===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# A brown pill used in traditional [[Tibetan]] medicine "to counteract inflammation, alleviate pain and relieve rheumatic condition, in the treatment of tonsillitis, pharyngitis, influenza, anthrax, rheumatic arthritis, neuralgia, gastralgia and toothache". Caution is typically advised as the pills are toxic if taken in large quantities.

Wuwei Shexiang pills have the following herbal ingredients:
